name: Niche $50,000 Scholarship
description: No essay required! Monthly scholarship drawing for $50,000 awarded to one high school or college student. Simply create a free Niche profile to enter.

name: Niche $2,000 No Essay Scholarship
description: Monthly $2,000 scholarship with no essay required. Open to high school and college students. Winners selected through monthly drawings.

name: STEM Major Scholarship - $10,000
description: Scholarship for high school seniors planning to major in STEM fields including engineering, computer science, mathematics, or natural sciences. Requires essay on STEM career goals.

name: Women in STEM Scholarship - $5,000
description: Scholarship supporting female students pursuing STEM degrees. Applicants must demonstrate strong academic performance and commitment to STEM career.

name: Computer Science Excellence Award - $7,500
description: Award for high school students demonstrating excellence in computer science through coursework, projects, or competitions. Essay on programming experience required.

name: Engineering Future Leaders Scholarship - $8,000
description: Scholarship for aspiring engineers demonstrating leadership and innovation. Requires essay on engineering project or design challenge completed.

name: Environmental Science Scholarship - $5,000
description: Award for students passionate about environmental science and sustainability. Essay on environmental impact project or research required.

name: Mathematics Achievement Scholarship - $6,000
description: Recognition for high school students with exceptional mathematics abilities. Requires proof of math competition participation or advanced coursework.

name: Biomedical Sciences Scholarship - $7,000
description: Scholarship for students interested in biomedical research, medicine, or healthcare sciences. Essay on healthcare innovation or medical research interest required.
